title: What constitutes 'intelligent life', and is it inevitable? - Quora

response.answer_text: Maybe there is confusion in the definition of life because many ideate intelligent life with technological intelligence as in extraterrestrials, but, of course, any biological life that is in microbial form and has a motility, or the ability of an organism to move independently, is another sign of the presence of life whether we turn over a log in the forest or turn over a boulder on another planet and examine both microscopically, we have witnessed life…but not technologically intelligent life….yet.
